job.title: Junior Software Engineer - Cloud Applications
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: Are you starting your career in Software Engineering? Are you eager, creative and passionate about creating innovative and meaningful solutions that help us solve national security problems? If you are interested in using your talents to help develop next-generation software applications that will improve the speed and accuracy of intelligence gathering and information understanding, then Expedition Technology is the team to join!  We are seeking junior/early-career Software Engineers who will work alongside a team of talented developers that are building the future of intelligence applications. We hire people who are eager, intellectually curious and creative while empowering them to innovate with flexibility and autonomy.  If you join our team, you’ll work with an extremely talented, motivated, supportive and welcoming team in an Agile ecosystem. You’ll work alongside experienced engineers while performing full-stack software development, including the design, development, troubleshooting, and debugging of cutting-edge software programs and products. You will work together with your team to determine overall application design, gather requirements, develop tools and enhancements and deploy enterprise-wide solutions. You’ll also help develop solutions to complex issues that involve employing creativity, technical prowess and out-of-the-box thinking to achieve results.  Does that sound like a challenge you’d like to embrace? We are a recognized leader in machine learning research and development areas including sensors and signal processing, electronic warfare, and video and image understanding. We seek to utilize machine learning/artificial intelligence to advance our understanding of signals and systems in a rapidly changing environment. Many of our efforts have transitioned to Phase II or III programs designed to advance the use of artificial intelligence in the signal processing domain. We are proud that our dynamic and collaborative culture along with our generous benefits package allowed us to earn a spot on the 2019, 2020 and the 2021 Washington Business Journal's Best Places to Work List. We are also a 2021 Top Workplace as named by the Washington Post.  We offer a robust benefits package designed to meet the varying needs of our team. Benefits include:  Expedition Technology (EXP) offers a flexible, self-directed benefits package that is designed to fit your individual needs. Benefits include:
